mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.bumen AS "bumen", a.benyue_renshu AS "benyueRenshu", a.shangyuemo_renshu AS "shangyuemoRenshu", a.ruzhi AS "ruzhi", a.lizhi_zhudong AS "lizhiZhudong", a.lizhi_beidong AS "lizhiBeidong", a.zhuanzheng AS "zhuanzheng", a.tiaogang AS "tiaogang", a.tiaoxin AS "tiaoxin", a.zhixing_shijian AS "zhixingShijian", a.beizhu AS "beizhu"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO check_change_result( id, create_date, update_date, del_flag, bumen, benyue_renshu, shangyuemo_renshu, ruzhi, lizhi_zhudong, lizhi_beidong, zhuanzheng, tiaogang, tiaoxin, zhixing_shijian, beizhu ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{bumen}, #{benyueRenshu}, #{shangyuemoRenshu}, #{ruzhi}, #{lizhiZhudong}, #{lizhiBeidong}, #{zhuanzheng}, #{tiaogang}, #{tiaoxin}, #{zhixingShijian}, #{beizhu} )
mapper.update: UPDATE check_change_result SET update_date = #{updateDate}, bumen = #{bumen}, benyue_renshu = #{benyueRenshu}, shangyuemo_renshu = #{shangyuemoRenshu}, ruzhi = #{ruzhi}, lizhi_zhudong = #{lizhiZhudong}, lizhi_beidong = #{lizhiBeidong}, zhuanzheng = #{zhuanzheng}, tiaogang = #{tiaogang}, tiaoxin = #{tiaoxin}, zhixing_shijian = #{zhixingShijian}, beizhu = #{beizhu} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM check_change_result WHERE del_flag = '0' AND DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{date} AND type = #{type}

SELECT sum(benyue_renshu) AS benyue_renshu, sum(shangyuemo_renshu) AS shangyuemo_renshu, sum(ruzhi) AS ruzhi, sum(lizhi_zhudong) AS lizhi_zhudong, sum(lizhi_beidong) AS lizhi_beidong, sum(zhuanzheng) AS zhuanzheng, sum(tiaogang) AS tiaogang, sum(tiaoxin) AS tiaoxin FROM check_change_result WHERE del_flag = '0' AND DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{date}
